ABUSEIPDB_API.title: ABUSEIPDB.com API token
ABUSEIPDB_API.description: Required (free) AbuseIPDB api token. See https://www.abuseipdb.com/register

MAX_AGE_DAYS.title: The maximum age of reports to be included. defaults to 30 days

REQUEST_TIMEOUT.title: Timeout for slow lookup requests, defaults to 60 seconds
